Title: MSAP for WPF (another MVVM for WPF)
Description: MSAP is an application framework based on the pattern MVVM. It aims to structure and organize the development of a WPF application type Browser Application (XBAP). To do this he introduces models for (ViewModels VM) which allow to organize the application module, service, page.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
MSAP is an application framework based on the pattern MVVM. It aims to structure and organize the development of a WPF application type Browser Application (XBAP). To do this he introduces models for (ViewModels VM) which allow to organize the application module, service, page.

Le framework MSAP est un framework applicatif basé sur le pattern MVVM. Il a pour but de structurer et d’organiser le développement d’une application WPF de type Browser application (XBAP). Pour ce faire il introduit des modèles de vue (ViewModels VM) qui permettent d’organiser l’application en module, service, et actions.

La version actuelle supporte uniquement le mode Browser application (XBAP) en Full Trust

Modele static de classe (UML).


L'application exemple en xBap WPF.
